Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class SchoolBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.SchoolBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SchoolBoard extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the school board. Every player has one and it represents the internal state of each single player and his capabilities to "beat" or not other players during professors and islands exchanges.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • SchoolBoard

      public SchoolBoard(TowerColor color, GameMode mode) throws NullPointerException
      Creats a SchoolBoard object.
      Parameters:
      color - Color for the board's towers.
      mode - Game mode.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - Thrown if the color or the mode are null.

  • Method Details

    • setPlayersNumber

      public void setPlayersNumber(Integer playersNumber) throws IllegalArgumentException, IllegalStateException
      Sets the players number.
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - Number of players in the game..
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the given number of players is invalid.
      IllegalStateException - Thrown if the maxStudentsInEntrance and maxTowers are set.
